arts.ttl: Post-Match Reactions: Newfound Corner Merchants Borussia Dortmund Defeat Mainz
arts.sum: Dortmund would follow it up minutes later with a goal from a corner kick by Emre Can, the first of two on the day, courtesy of an excellent delivery by Nico Schlotterbeck. Despite getting multiple chances on counter-attacks, Dortmund scored their third goal on yet another corner kick by Nico Schlotterbeck.

arts.ttl: Badstuber inspired Kovac to put Schlotterbeck in corner duty
arts.sum: Nico Schlotterbeck provided two assists from corner-kicks in Dortmund’s 3-1 win over Mainz. The defender spoke about the surprise decision after the game.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: BVB Bounce Back After International Break with 3-1 Win Against Mainz
arts.sum: Kovač unlocked a new setup for his Dortmund side, running with a 3-5-2 with Beier and Karim Adeyemi playing up top, and a new set-piece wizard in Nico Schlotterbeck, who picked up two assists and gave Mainz a ton of problems from corner-kicks all game long. Goals from Maximilian Beier (x2) and Emre Can gave BVB a clear lead, and while Mainz pulled one back late in the game, it never really looked in doubt.

One team fighting for the Champions League, the other languishing in mid-table mediocrity. That’s right, Champions League chasing Mainz travelled to Borussia Dortmund. Mainz were very much in control for…

arts.ttl: Schlotti corners recipe for Dortmund in huge win over Mainz
arts.sum: Dortmund end Mainz’s unbeaten run with two goals in the final five minutes of the first-half.

arts.ttl: Match Thread: BVB Come Out of International Break Against Mainz
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. Streaming: ESPN+ (US), DAZN, sportschau.de (Germany), sky sports+ (UK)

arts.ttl: Guirassy absent from BVB’s huge clash?
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy is missing from Dortmund’s squad when they traveled to the team hotel ahead of the game against Mainz. Meanwhile, there is a surprise inclusion in his place.

arts.sum: AS Monaco full-back Caio Henrique (27) almost made a move to Borussia Dortmund late in the January transfer window, according to a report from L’Équipe. At the time of the approach,…
